name: Radius (Kingsoft)
overview: A horizontally scrolling shooter from Kingsoft and programmed by Fido Müller. With your super-powered space ship you must try to destroy the largest number of alien spaceships from a distant planet. You have 4 lives available, the game screens are many, each with their own charm. Released in Italy by several publishing houses including Editions Fermont's compilation release Mega Games n.16 (gennaio 1989).
